asap.textengine

Class TimedSpeechTextUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • asap.realizer.planunit.TimedAbstractPlanUnit
      • asap.textengine.TimedAbstractTextUnit
        • asap.textengine.TimedSpeechTextUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    asap.realizer.planunit.TimedPlanUnit

    public class TimedSpeechTextUnit
extends TimedAbstractTextUnit
    Implements a SpeechBehaviour by sending the speech text at a certain SPEECH_RATE through a text output channel. The TimedTextSpeechUnit allows time warping on all its segments.
    Author:
    Herwin
